snippet: The party’s opposition to same-sex marriage and legalization of marijuana is causing a rift along generational lines.
abstract: Emerging tension is growing between younger Republicans who are pro-free market on fiscal issues and libertarian on social ones and the older social conservatives at core of party's base; party’s opposition to issues like same-sex marriage and legalization of marijuana is causing rift along generational lines, even as more progressive views represent potential growth for party that is losing among certain demographic groups.
lead_paragraph: The party’s opposition to same-sex marriage and legalization of marijuana is causing a rift along generational lines.

headline.main: Young Republicans Find Fault With Elders on List of Social Issues
headline.print_headline: Young Republicans Find Fault With Elders on List of Social Issues

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
